game.name: Train Simulator: China Railways HXD1
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Discover ‘Harmony’ with the China Railways HXD1, a new Chinese electric locomotive from Just Trains.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Discover ‘Harmony’ with the China Railways HXD1, a new Chinese electric locomotive from Just Trains.
